title: Ellie Kemper (And Mindy Kaling!) | Trump Cancels North Korea Summit, Pushes Crazy Spy Claim: A Closer Look
description:
Seth previews "The Late Night with Seth Meyers Podcast: Summer Fridays", where we will release fully original episodes of the Late Night Podcast throughout the summer when Late Night is on hiatus. Look for the first episode in this feed starting June 1.

Then, Seth takes a closer look at the president canceling his summit with North Korea and pushing a baseless conspiracy theory about the Russia probe.

After that, Seth talks to Ellie Kemper (and Mindy Kaling, who hung around to visit her old friend from The Office) about the new season of Unbreakable Kimmy Schmidt. Kemper also stuck around backstage exclusively for the podcast to talk to producer Kevin Miller.
